attributes.action: ENDEAVOR TO ENSURE THAT CONVICTED RAPISTS GET LIFE SENTENCES AND SERVE THEIR ENTIRETY WITH NO PAROLE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A lot of convicted rapists are walking our streets again within 2-4 years of their sentence. A standard sentence for rape is a life sentence which currently stands at 12 years. With so many cases not even reaching a point of trial due to a lack of evidence, coupled with the amount of people too afraid to report it and the 6% of rapes that end in conviction that leaves a scary amount of rapists walking and working around us.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
